item.title: Building ROS2 on Android
item.description: https://github.com/termux/proot-distro termux-setup-storage pkg install proot-distro proot-distro login ubuntu --termux-home Install ROS

item.title: Handy Termux Commands
item.description: pkg install openssl openssh gnupg iproute2 pkg install nmap # port scanning pkg install dnsutils # dig pkg install termux-tools termux-setup-storage pkg install python3 git pkg install cmake pip install matplotlib pkg update pkg install tsu # is this necessary?

item.title: Installing GrapheneOS on a Pixel 4a
item.description: Instructions derived from https://grapheneos.org/install/cli Download Developer Tools sudo apt install android-sdk-platform-tools-common sudo apt install signify-openbsd echo "alias signify=signify-openbsd" >> ~/.
